settings.title: WHY IT  IS  DELUXE
settings.text:
Simple, it is our softest nappy ever, gentle on skins with all the good stuff none of the nasties, your baby will feel like they’re sitting on a cloud.


With ultra-fast maximum absorbency keeping your little one dryer and more comfortable for up to 12 hours with ultra-dry leak protecting meaning better night’s sleep for mums, dads and bubs.


And all of this at a price you will love!

settings.heading: Where to buy
settings.text: If your local supermarket does not have kiddicare® on their shelves, ask them to stock us — and get your friends and family to ask too—this lets them know that there is a local demand.

settings.heading: Kiddicare are proud supporters of Mummys In Need
